Develop work requirements and design.
Threat modeling is performed on new functionality or updates to existing functionality. Any mitigations identified are added as requirements for the implementation.
Document work requirements in Backlog item. Store related documents on the shared location.
Meet to discuss design, overall architecture, work breakdown, and task assignments. Track the work with Backlog items.
Complete iterative cycle of the following in the Development and Test environments:
Create a of changes to be deployed.
Review code. This must be completed by a development team member who did not author the changes.
Deploy to the Test Environment.
Regress the build.

: Copy the build from the Code Staging Environment to the Production Environment using of the following methods:
Automatically (EMC Build Tool): System scripts are run automatically to complete code promotion.
Automatically (Azure DevOps): System scripts are run automatically to complete code promotion.
Manually: Members of the Release Management Group (RMG) manually complete code promotion by interacting with the remaining affected folders and database entries.

Record any bugs or problems with the release and maintain the for one week.If there is an issue (build, technical, environmental) that causes production to break, an emergency exception may be initiated.
